title: (x) Grand Finale - Bellevue {Patricia}
content:
I'm trying to track down this Bodoni-ish/Didot-ish italic with swash caps. Anyone?   
   
 ![Grand Finale](http://web.archive.org/web/20050825163020im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/43125.jpg)   
   
Thanks in advance.
author: Grant Hutchinson

comments.content: Thanks Patricia. I thought it looked familiar, because it used to be part of the Adobe library... I just couldn't put my finger on it.
